original_text: And the Lord heard the voice of your words, when ye spake unto me; and the Lord said unto me, I have heard the voice of the words of this people, which they have spoken unto thee: they have well said all that they have spoken.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희가 내게 말할 때에 너희가 말하는 소리를 들으신지라 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 이 백성이 네게 말하는 그 말소리를 내가 들은즉 그 말이 다 옳도다

sentences.original_text: And the Lord heard the voice of your words
and the Lord said unto me
I have heard the voice of the words of this people
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 백성의 말 소리를 들었노라

sentences.original_text: which they have spoken unto thee
they have well said all that they have spoken
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말한 모든 것을 잘 말하였노라
